name: df-rngiso
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(crs, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, crab(s2, co(cv(s0), crh, cv(s1)), wcel(ccnv(cv(s2)), co(cv(s1), crh, cv(s0))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ RingIso =(s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { s2 ∈(s0[RingHom]s1)| `' s2 ∈(s1[RingHom]s0)})
comment: Define the set of ring isomorphisms from ` r ` to ` s ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)
